website_summaries.verdict: The simple and sleek black wrought iron design of this screen doesn't take enjoyment away from the fire.
pros: This screen is ideal for fireplaces in a recess
It's freestanding and sits flush to the wall, yet is sturdy enough that you won't have to worry about it being knocked over easily
Features an excellent quality frame and sturdy mesh
cons: Some users report that the feet don't sit correctly

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Missing parts, Damaged screen: avoid!
customer_reviews.text: Waste of time. Please don’t bother. Screen shipped with missing parts as well as numerous defects. In total about 7 snags on the mesh, two of which are several inches long. No handles were included, as are pictured in the listing and also in the product assembly manual. I was sure they were just stuck in the box or wrapping or something and after checking several times — nope, just simply not here. Will be returning. What a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Jameson Williams

customer_reviews.title: Very secure, sturdy fireplace guard
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy, unobtrusive fireplace guard. I will preface this by saying we rarely use our fireplace, but primarily bought this item to prevent our infant daughter from crawling into the space. The screen offers minimal obstruction to the view of the fireplace. And the "feet" of the guard have a very short projection, but hold the guard in place very securely.
customer_reviews.author: Sagir Bera

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful screen. We have it up against our gas fireplace because we have a baby who crawls. This has prevented her from burning herself, because the bottom third does not heat up AT ALL. And the area right in front of the fireplace heating area barely gets warm. Wonderful, sturdy screen! (Sturdy for us on porcelain tile.)
customer_reviews.author: SassyPants

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: The fireplace works just fine and what I was looking for. I would have given it 5 stars, but there were a couple imperfections in wire mesh. Thankfully I was able to kind of fix them with some tweezers. Putting the legs and handles on was a breeze and I'm not one to assemble anything (I typically leave that to my husband). All in all, I'm very happy with this screen and it was priced fair.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Firescreen
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of either having to stay up half the night waiting for the fire to die down or having to pour water on the fire to ensure safety while everyone was sleeping. This screen goes all the way down to the bottom and also covers the top and both sides of the fireplace so no sparks can get out. It is very sturdy and surprisingly light to use the convenient handles to move it to the side to add logs.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Cardinal

customer_reviews.title: Fits recessed gas fireplace perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I have a sealed gas fireplace (glass front, no access to the logs) but the glass gets quite hot. I wanted this to create a bit of an 'air barrier' to keep our cats from burning themselves on the glass. The fireplace is also in a recessed area under the mantle, and this screen is PERFECT. It sits out about 4" from the glass but is still within the recessed area, so it's nearly invisible while still creating a barrier that the cats can't get behind. The legs make it very sturdy, and it's solid. I had no issues with damages or bad shipping, all in all this was exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: SndraDee

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t be happier with this grate. It arrived in perfect condition and was easy to assemble. The sleek minimal style allows the beauty of the fire place come through.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Elbe

customer_reviews.title: Simple, attractive, but NOT freestanding
customer_reviews.text: This sparkguard matches the simple, modern aesthetic of my home and does what it should as far as safety goes. It does not, however, stand up on its own. When it's in place, it's not a problem, as it can lean against the mantle itself. However, when performing maintenance on the fireplace (tending logs, emptying ash, etc.), it's a mild annoyance to find some place to rest it. A very nice product; just wish it could stand up on its own.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine S

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I love the simple look. I didn’t give it 5 stars because the packaging is terrible and it came slightly bent. The flimsy box was torn and something heavy rested on it. I’d return it but, for the price, it isn’t worth the trouble and you don’t really notice the bend at the angle it’s at in my home. I will say it’s sturdy enough that we can’t bend it back flat.
customer_reviews.author: HAG

customer_reviews.title: Must purchase this fire screen! Well made and fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my new gas log set, wanted plain so I could see the logs and keep cats out. I did not add the brace in center since left a gap on sides that possibly cat could squeeze through. Very happy with my purchase. Measurements were right on for the large size.
customer_reviews.author: Pippye708

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: This style was exactly what I was looking for. It only has legs on one side so it must sit directly against the fireplace opening for it will topple over. It fits perfectly and is unobtrusive. The mesh isn't as durable as I would like but it is what it is for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Yoshiko Ichikura

customer_reviews.title: A perfect fit for our home
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a fireplace cover to protect our children and animals from going into the fireplace, but we didn't want to block the actual fire. Many fireplace covers had so much detail that you wouldn't even see the fire when it was going. We love the natural look of the fireplace that we can still get using this cover guard. It fit our fireplace perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended and good looking
customer_reviews.text: The packaging of this screen was insufficient. There were no supports in the cardboard box it was shipped in. While it was complete, the hardware was in unsealed bags. The box was crushed in some places and the screen was bent. I was able to fix the screen and it does seem to do what it is intended to do.
customer_reviews.author: MAM

customer_reviews.title: Need quality control...misshapen support bracket
customer_reviews.text: The middle support bracket wasn't bent correctly so it could not be screwed on. I expected better from a product over $100 and it would be a pain to return. No email was provided either to contact the company. Disappointed, otherwise would have been nice.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Screen/Grate becomes discolored with heat
customer_reviews.text: I built a new home and bought things to check of my list, probably too early in some cases. I actually purchased this last winter and only started making fires the following. Anyhow, I just missed the 1 year manufacturer's warranty. I respect that the manufacturer couldn't honor the warranty as I was technically out of date but I feel I should let people know that the grate/screen becomes discolored if used consistently with normal sized fires. It seems the paint burned off and white spots were revealed. Picture isn't the best but tried to highlight what happened to me.
customer_reviews.author: Paulo Da Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Came damaged without a handle
customer_reviews.text: This product is not wrought iron in any sense of anything I’ve ever seen before - also the screen arrived damaged in the corner, the box was previously opened and it came with one handle. We are going through a remodel so I just got to opening this and it had a 30 day return policy that just expired I’ll contact the seller and hopefully I can get at least a handle out of it
customer_reviews.author: arnold mortzheim

customer_reviews.title: Stay away.
customer_reviews.text: I sent back two of these one because the packaging had holes in it, which caused the screen the have a hole. Then upon further inspection the screen wasn’t even welded to the frame in spots and small holes throughout welds. Second one came, package was good screen was worse... I decided to spend a little more money and buy a better made screen....no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Margie R.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Does its job! It's kinda a pain to move it to get to the fire, but lightweight and a very cheap option to keep our home safe from fire.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: If you like this style, get it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to do a weird job of blocking snow at the door of my mountain home. And it worked. But, dang, it's a very nice, well-made firescreen.
customer_reviews.author: CIB

customer_reviews.title: Good basic fire screen
customer_reviews.text: This is very basic but it’s easy to assemble and works as intended. I don’t understand why these things cost so much, but this one was relatively reasonably priced
customer_reviews.author: M/R

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: The screen is as described. It is stable and sits close to the fireplace. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Renata

customer_reviews.title: Good for it's purpose
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit and simplicity of this product however this is the second one sent with manufacturing imperfections. Easy to assemble... lays flat against opening which is what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie P.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Damaged!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived dented! I read a few of the reviews which stated the same thing. This is a large item to have to lug back to the UPS store to return it, especially because it arrived damaged. I will not be ordering a replacement. Too much hassle if another one arrives damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A picture's worth a thousand curse words
customer_reviews.text: How many straight lines do you see within the red outlines? Needless to say, I'm returning this China-made piece of junk. I'm now going to buy a fireplace screen that costs 4 times as much but is probably 500 times better, because it's made in the USA and comes with a lifetime warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Peakay

customer_reviews.title: Buy it new. Product is great
customer_reviews.text: Considering mine was “used” and damaged it’s a decent deal. Fortunately I was able to finagle it to where it’s not noticeable. Other than that I’m happy
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Mister

customer_reviews.title: Second time is a charm!
customer_reviews.text: Second time is a charm! First one sent had a flaw in the weaving of the mesh screen. Amazon customer service had another send next day. Fabulous. Just what I thought it would be. Neat sleek, easy to assemble. Decent quality too!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Fullerton

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This screen is well made and saves hundreds of dollars over a custom made screen.
customer_reviews.author: William F

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: The product was not packaged carefully and arrived bent with scuff marks. The bending of the screen warped the frame and made it difficult to assemble properly. It does seem to be a nice and sturdy screen that would be easy to assemble if it were shipped with more care.
customer_reviews.author: zoe

customer_reviews.title: Nice ....
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with it. It does perfectelly the job. I bougth the L size . Has a clean line and easy to assembly ( minutes).
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: Simple,  sturdy,  perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this screen - perfect fit, exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: SOP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my outdoor fireplace. Sits flush with the front of the fireplace.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly. Despite looking top heavy
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly. Despite looking top heavy, it is quite sturdy. Does its job and the minimalist design doesn't draw attention away from your fireplace.
customer_reviews.author: NATHANIEL BILYEU

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Well made. We had to send it back because it isn't the right size but we're ordering the next size up. I love how it sits flush over the fireplace opening.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wire mesh screen had 'picks'/misweaves
customer_reviews.text: The frame is solid. Unfortunately there were misweaves in the wire mesh. Since the whole thing is black it is not that noticeable. I elected to just keep it instead of worrying with a reorder/return.
customer_reviews.author: CES

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: seems to do the job - protection for a 3 yr old.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Simple design doesn't detract from fireplace front
customer_reviews.text: well made, stout, easy to assemble. Does what it says.
customer_reviews.author: MCS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and keeps my kitty out of my fireplace. I like the simplicity of it’s style.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie J

customer_reviews.title: Bent frame but protects from flames
customer_reviews.text: Arrived Damaged. The product looks okay and does what it is required, but not happy about product arriving damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Came completely bent. Total waste of my money and time. Bottom line - a piece of junk. Item was just thrown in a box - no protective barrier.
customer_reviews.author: Donna A.

customer_reviews.title: It's just not as sturdy as we would have liked
customer_reviews.text: We got this to keep the kids out of the fireplace. It's okay although a little wobbly, even with the feet. It's just not as sturdy as we would have liked.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Oloo

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service Lacking
customer_reviews.text: My only compliant is a bolt for one of the handles is missing and I am unable to reach Uniflame to get the bolt. The customer service # provided is just a voice my loop that goes no where.
customer_reviews.author: Dina Gorzell

customer_reviews.title: Keeps cats out of a dirty fireplace!
customer_reviews.text: Looks very cute and clean in front of my fireplace, and meets the desired goal of keeping my 2 mischievous kittens out of the dirty fireplace!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Ackerman

customer_reviews.title: Blends in with your fireplace
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a discrete cover that wasn’t expensive. This looked just as good as other at double the price. Nicely made too
customer_reviews.author: Major Guide

customer_reviews.title: Great for baby proofing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to baby proof our fireplace. It works better than I thought it would! I did not assembled any pieces that it came with due to no need with how my fireplace is set up.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Cook

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be good quality. Heavier than I expected. Weight makes it seem more substantial. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... I had to order (the first one was really bad shape) and this one was damaged as well and ...
customer_reviews.text: this is the second one I had to order (the first one was really bad shape) and this one was damaged as well and built really flimsy. I am just eating it and moving forward. I would not suggest this item
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: received somewhat bent
customer_reviews.text: great product. was a tad bent when received. maybe from shipping?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product that isn’t damaged
customer_reviews.text: The product was delivered 2 times damaged. Clearly after reading other reviews this has been a problem for a long time. I’m not going to try again
customer_reviews.author: Vincent J Bellafiore

customer_reviews.title: JUST PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Like my new product fits perfectly in my fireplace. Easy to assemble I just think theyshould lower the price.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Exact fit for my fireplace
customer_reviews.text: I like the simplicity & functionality of the design. I needed a new fireplace screen as I am putting my home up for sale. .
customer_reviews.author: Gazza

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Item was damaged right out of the box. The box was undamaged, so I believe it was damaged before shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: It looks good. It’s a bit wobbly. My husband, modified it a bit to make it sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa  Connelly

customer_reviews.title: Love My Sparkguard
customer_reviews.text: While it's not the fanciest. It is neat & clean and serves its purpose. It was a decent price. My only complaint was that two of the screws weren't long enough so we had to go into our stash of tools to finally assemble it. Thank goodness we had them- I really didn't feel like going through the hassle of sending the entire thing back because it didn't come with the proper equipment. Otherwise I do like it.
customer_reviews.author: Karith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! This was exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! This was exactly what I needed. I needed something to keep the cats from the fireplace. The screen sits flush and is heavy enough to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Caj

customer_reviews.title: Love this screen
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a trifold screen that stuck out far from the fireplace. I love that this fits flush against the fireplace and looks very modern. It feels well-made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Condeenj

customer_reviews.title: fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: basic, fit perfectly, very nice looking. It stands up nicely. I would buy this again if needed. Not much more I can say about this fireplace screen
customer_reviews.author: airay

customer_reviews.title: No fires here
customer_reviews.text: I bought because I am currently working on my fireplace and needed to be safe while having a fire this price can't be beat!!
customer_reviews.author: Dave B.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and protects  from Sparks!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!! After have a spark fly over my last one .. Sparkguards is the way to go.. Especially since it is so low profile!
customer_reviews.author: Claudine M. Ferrara

customer_reviews.title: Good price for the size
customer_reviews.text: Good price for the size. It is so plain and functional and allows full view of the fire. It's almost like no screen at all.
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We loved this! It's exactly as pictured. A super fair price, quick shipping and arrived without damage.
customer_reviews.author: gh

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, perfectly simple design and was exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Brener

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A good weight, subtle, does what it's supposed to do!
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made piece! Plain and simple
customer_reviews.text: Description is accurate. This is definitely nicely made and for the money you can't beat it. Very simple to throw it together. I'm pretty picky and I was quite pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I've tried to purchase twice now. First time I purchased as a Warehouse Deal, and the screen was broken in several places. Looked like packaging was not adequate. But I like the nice simple design, and price, so thought I would give it one more try, and purchase new. Second time was even worse; although screen was not "broken", it was so poorly manufactured that in large sections stretching all the way across, and up and down, the wire was tangled and uneven, so it is noticeable even from far away. Nice design, but I am giving up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: It isn't the most sturdy thing ever made, but for the price, it is perfect. I would recommend it. Yo.
customer_reviews.author: Heather L. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: It will do the job
customer_reviews.text: I like the flat profile and it was very straightforward to assemble. Like the simple and plain design on it.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte L.

customer_reviews.title: Too Big
customer_reviews.text: Way too large for my rather big fireplace returned the item
customer_reviews.author: David Unks

customer_reviews.title: Good Barrier
customer_reviews.text: Perfect as a portable barrier to keep items from falling off a bed.
customer_reviews.author: E. Eugene Byrd, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: We have an old house with a high narrow brick fireplace opening with a wide framed mantle. This fit perfect. Easy to put together and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Jett

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality metal work, low price= bad product
customer_reviews.text: I had to fix it, and paint it. Next time I will buy a better one. Made in USA, Live and learn.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L

customer_reviews.title: Basic but appears serviceable
customer_reviews.text: I have not tried it with a real fie yet but it appears sturdy enough.
customer_reviews.author: Peter JR

customer_reviews.title: Poor value
customer_reviews.text: screen came with a crease, feet don't attach properly causing the unit to stand at an angle, paint is chipped, poor quality overall. ended up keeping it simply b/c it does work (then again how could it not?) and its too big of a hassle to return. that being said would likely need to spend significantly more to get anything resembling a quality piece. buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep my sneaky cat out of the fireplace & this is perfect. It sits flush w/the wall so she can't fit her hand behind it & its heavy enough so she can't knock it over or move it. It's not so heavy though it can't easily be moved to tend a fire.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: This screen arrived quickly and in beautiful condition. It took less than 10 minutes to install the handles and feet and place it in front of my fireplace. It is sturdy and the screen is fine and allows me to see into the fireplace very clearly - notice the broken grate I need to replace. I like the feet very much because they add a colonial touch. I love the simple, clean look of this and can’t wait until it gets cold enough to have our first fire without worrying about burning pieces of wood popping out of the fireplace. I’m quite pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Emma Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed, slightly altered
customer_reviews.text: I needed a screen to keep my toddler from playing with the fireplace gravel. This was perfect. I did not attach the feet, and instead used several command strips to attach it directly to the fireplace. It's light enough to hold, and the screen is sturdy. Little man can't get his fingers under the edges. And it's sheer enough to still see through (double sided fireplace so that's important). I'm sure my application voids any manufacturer's warranty, but it worked!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: We just purchased this after we had the cast iron insert removed from our fireplace and converted back to a traditional fireplace. Excellent design and fits perfectly, Great for keeping sparks and the occasional flaming wood splinter from flying out onto the floor. Handles make it very easy to move. You can still see the fire very well. Screen seems to be of good quality. Only reason 4 stars and not 5 is because I was expecting a slightly more sturdy heavy item. This has a slight flimsy feel. Still, looks great, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Rafis

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, not great
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice sized (large) grate but it is a little wobbly out of the box. The legs don't sit quite flat so you may have to do a little bending to get it to sit correctly. Also, the inside leg runs into the brick of my fireplace. I don't know how it makes great sense to have a grate that is forced to be 3-4" out from the fire but that's how this works. It looks plenty nice and fits, but the leg style may or may not be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Chris McB

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy weight, fits flush.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed. Our gazebo has a large wood-burning fireplace that the local raccoons find very attractive for doing their business. Needed something that would press up flush against the opening, and with enough weight to keep them from pulling it away. This worked. Just wish it came in other colors, as the black is a bit harsh. Also, not sure how it will hold up to weather. Otherwise, it’s spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Miz Luv

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the cats out of the ash and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to keep the cats out of the ash in our fireplace. Another reviewer posted this worked for her same need so I went for it. It not only stopped the cats from doing that, but also looks great. It's very simple with clean lines. Goes well with our modern farmhouse decor.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Golladay

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t rate the durability only because I just got it but it looks sturdy and durable. It looks great in my living room. I’ve been looking for something simple yet elegant. It goes well with my decor. I’m so happy I dont have to worry about installing doors or something similar to my other fireplace and spend hundreds of dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Some small imperfections, easily fixed.
customer_reviews.text: This screen is the perfect size and style for our houses 1947 fireplace. I like how simple the design was. It is sturdy, and not tippy. A few reviewers complained there were some defects. Ours had a few odd sports, I took a small screw driver and adjusted the mesh a bit spacing wise- it looks perfect.
customer_reviews.author: The Gustafson’s

customer_reviews.title: Simple and useful
customer_reviews.text: I really like this space saving simple inexpensive fireplace screen. Does the job without adding too much bulkiness or taking up so much floor space. The mesh on mine is even unlike other reviews. I have no complaints and find price is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Teasley

customer_reviews.title: Wrought iron????  More like not iron
customer_reviews.text: Not wrought iron! Simple and clean design. Just a steel frame with a light weight screen. I am happy with my purchase though the screen was bent during shipping. (That’s how thin the screen is).
customer_reviews.author: Derik Fritsch

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble, and it is durable but it has a few flaws with the screen. You can see on the screen area that was damaged and fixed as well as spaces to far apart. For the price I did expect perfection.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene M. Moody

customer_reviews.title: “For decoration only”
customer_reviews.text: Pretty poor finishing on this. The screen is tacked on and bows away from the frame. But the thing that makes my blood boil is the “decoration only” tag inside the box. Basically I’ll charge you $100 But don’t want to take any responsibility for the product working. We will return this and look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G. Mattoch

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and fits tight to fireplace to keep out cats
customer_reviews.text: It fits tight into my fireplace, which was what I wanted to keep my cats out. I have only used the fireplace once, so I do not know how it holds up over time and heat.
customer_reviews.author: iridescentfire

customer_reviews.title: Fireplace on the porch
customer_reviews.text: Needed a screen that would work for the fireplace on the porch. It was an odd size. Lots of screens available but most were much more expensive. This works and was reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I recently remodeled my fireplace and removed the old style heavy mesh curtain. I purchased this to keep my pet away. This is perfect for my new fireplace.
customer_reviews.author: Dian_uh

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality and easy to assemble the stands
customer_reviews.text: We recently bought new home and one of the fireplaces did not have a fireplace screen. I live with my three grand children and so this freaked me out. I was thrilled to find a fireplace screen that was clean, simple and covered the opening space EXACTLY for such a reasonable price! Very nice quality and easy to assemble the stands.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Isabel LaVaute

customer_reviews.title: It just ok
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to right home about..... will change it once I find something I like better
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: This is surprisingly awesome for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is surprisingly awesome for the price. It fits almost perfectly flush against the fireplace and looks very streamlined. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith M

customer_reviews.title: Good fireplace screen stays flat against the surface around the fireplace .
customer_reviews.text: Stays flat against the surface around the fireplace . Easy to assemble and well priced
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Feliciano

customer_reviews.title: Dimensions are exact
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for a great clean look. Its hard to find this particular size, and I could not be happier. The dimensions are exactly as specified.
customer_reviews.author: JkWitt

customer_reviews.title: Great fireplace screen
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this fireplace guard for about a year now: It has never fallen over! It works great. Looks brand new still. But, the screws keep coming undone on the bottom feet making it dangerous. I just kept putting them back in, but finally one screw was lost :(
customer_reviews.author: B.L.

customer_reviews.title: Basic, simple design.  Works well.
customer_reviews.text: This particular screen was the perfect size for our fireplace. We appreciate the "no frills" design; it doesn't detract from the tile and mantelpiece. Easy to assemble. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Star

customer_reviews.title: sleek and practical
customer_reviews.text: It's practical design, stable and well contain the ash within the fireplace. Bonus points it adds some oomph to my fire place and space-saving for my tight living room. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: rufinu

customer_reviews.title: looks great, happy I purchased
customer_reviews.text: the flush design is so much nicer than the flappy ones. Looks great against my fireplace.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy the Bull

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: The first one we ordered came totally bent out of shape. We returned it for a replacement which is still slightly wonky but does the job well enough. It looks decent as long as you aren’t looking at it too closely
customer_reviews.author: CoCo.S.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Just what I wanted. Well made, sturdy and the dogs can’t knock it over!
customer_reviews.author: tetedurouge

customer_reviews.title: Great fireplace screen!
customer_reviews.text: We like it because it is not too decorative and looks very nice in front of our fireplace. Our son has bought one because he liked it so much!
customer_reviews.author: bcheek

product_meta.title: Uniflame, S-1127, Medium Wrought Iron Sparkguard
product_meta.description: Size:MediumAdd beauty to your fireplace with the UniFlame single-panel fireplace screen, by Blue Rhino. This durable fireplace screen features a sturdy wrought iron frame with steel legs and heavy gauge mesh. Featuring a black finish, this screen includes integrated handles for easy lifting.
